sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A hue and cry after the worst of murderers, in the case of the Duke of Buckingham. Wright, Mary, fl. 1679-1680.
4 p.
Printed for T.F. and are to be sold by W. Davis in Amen-Corner, London : 1680.
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. Includes two depositions on the attempted murder, from Mary Wright. Imperfect: creased with slight loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
